name: Eat your cereals
description:
Synopsis

You’re awake, it’s time to do what you do everyday : eat your cereals ! Do it, everyday, because everyone loves cereals. Don’t you ? Ah ah, you should. You really should. You wouldn’t want to anger it, don’t you ?

How to play

It’s easy, grab the spoon, get some cereals and shove them into your mouth !

Disclaimer

This game was an experimentation for me and I also have to add : if you’re easily disgusted, you might not want to play it. I laked some time, I wish I could have added some more spooky stuff to it but i’m a lone programmer and I can only do so much by myself. But it’s fine, I had fun (most of the time, lol)

Hope you’ll like whatever the heck I created ! 

Credits

The background image is made by a friend. The photos were taken on publicdomainpictures.net and pickpik.com, the sounds are from freesound.org and the music from a Unity Asset.
